snippet: The child was born over the weekend to Robyn Benson in Victoria, British Columbia, after she was declared brain-dead because of a cerebral hemorrhage.
abstract: Robyn Benson, pregnant Canadian woman who was legally declared brain-dead after cerebral hemorrhage on December 28, gives birth to healthy baby; Benson is removed from life support at request of her family after the birth.
lead_paragraph: The child was born over the weekend to Robyn Benson in Victoria, British Columbia, after she was declared brain-dead because of a cerebral hemorrhage.

headline.main: Canada: Healthy Baby Is Delivered by Woman Declared Brain-Dead
headline.print_headline: Canada: Healthy Baby Is Delivered by Woman Declared Brain-Dead
